00012 // converts rgb() and #xxx to #xxxxxx format,  
00013 // returns self (or first argument) if not convertable  
00014 String.prototype.parseColor = function() {  
00015   var color = '#';
00016   if (this.slice(0,4) == 'rgb(') {  
00017     var cols = this.slice(4,this.length-1).split(',');  
00018     var i=0; do { color += parseInt(cols[i]).toColorPart() } while (++i<3);  
00019   } else {  
00020     if (this.slice(0,1) == '#') {  
00021       if (this.length==4) for(var i=1;i<4;i++) color += (this.charAt(i) + this.charAt(i)).toLowerCase();  
00022       if (this.length==7) color = this.toLowerCase();  
00023     }  
00024   }  
00025   return (color.length==7 ? color : (arguments[0] || this));  
00026 };

00030 Element.collectTextNodes = function(element) {  
00031   return $A($(element).childNodes).collect( function(node) {
00032     return (node.nodeType==3 ? node.nodeValue : 
00033       (node.hasChildNodes() ? Element.collectTextNodes(node) : ''));
00034   }).flatten().join('');
00035 };
00036 
00037 Element.collectTextNodesIgnoreClass = function(element, className) {  
00038   return $A($(element).childNodes).collect( function(node) {
00039     return (node.nodeType==3 ? node.nodeValue : 
00040       ((node.hasChildNodes() && !Element.hasClassName(node,className)) ? 
00041         Element.collectTextNodesIgnoreClass(node, className) : ''));
00042   }).flatten().join('');
00043 };
00044 
00045 Element.setContentZoom = function(element, percent) {
00046   element = $(element);  
00047   element.setStyle({fontSize: (percent/100) + 'em'});   
00048   if (Prototype.Browser.WebKit) window.scrollBy(0,0);
00049   return element;
00050 };
00051 
00052 Element.getInlineOpacity = function(element){
00053   return $(element).style.opacity || '';
00054 };
00055 
00056 Element.forceRerendering = function(element) {
00057   try {
00058     element = $(element);
00059     var n = document.createTextNode(' ');
00060     element.appendChild(n);
00061     element.removeChild(n);
00062   } catch(e) { }
00063 };

00067 var Effect = {
00068   _elementDoesNotExistError: {
00069     name: 'ElementDoesNotExistError',
00070     message: 'The specified DOM element does not exist, but is required for this effect to operate'
00071   },
00072   Transitions: {
00073     linear: Prototype.K,
00074     sinoidal: function(pos) {
00075       return (-Math.cos(pos*Math.PI)/2) + 0.5;
00076     },
00077     reverse: function(pos) {
00078       return 1-pos;
00079     },
00080     flicker: function(pos) {
00081       var pos = ((-Math.cos(pos*Math.PI)/4) + 0.75) + Math.random()/4;
00082       return pos > 1 ? 1 : pos;
00083     },
00084     wobble: function(pos) {
00085       return (-Math.cos(pos*Math.PI*(9*pos))/2) + 0.5;
00086     },
00087     pulse: function(pos, pulses) { 
00088       pulses = pulses || 5; 
00089       return (
00090         ((pos % (1/pulses)) * pulses).round() == 0 ? 
00091               ((pos * pulses * 2) - (pos * pulses * 2).floor()) : 
00092           1 - ((pos * pulses * 2) - (pos * pulses * 2).floor())
00093         );
00094     },
00095     spring: function(pos) { 
00096       return 1 - (Math.cos(pos * 4.5 * Math.PI) * Math.exp(-pos * 6)); 
00097     },
00098     none: function(pos) {
00099       return 0;
00100     },
00101     full: function(pos) {
00102       return 1;
00103     }
00104   },
00105   DefaultOptions: {
00106     duration:   1.0,   // seconds
00107     fps:        100,   // 100= assume 66fps max.
00108     sync:       false, // true for combining
00109     from:       0.0,
00110     to:         1.0,
00111     delay:      0.0,
00112     queue:      'parallel'
00113   },
00114   tagifyText: function(element) {
00115     var tagifyStyle = 'position:relative';
00116     if (Prototype.Browser.IE) tagifyStyle += ';zoom:1';
00117     
00118     element = $(element);
00119     $A(element.childNodes).each( function(child) {
00120       if (child.nodeType==3) {
00121         child.nodeValue.toArray().each( function(character) {
00122           element.insertBefore(
00123             new Element('span', {style: tagifyStyle}).update(
00124               character == ' ' ? String.fromCharCode(160) : character), 
00125               child);
00126         });
00127         Element.remove(child);
00128       }
00129     });
00130   },
00131   multiple: function(element, effect) {
00132     var elements;
00133     if (((typeof element == 'object') || 
00134         Object.isFunction(element)) && 
00135        (element.length))
00136       elements = element;
00137     else
00138       elements = $(element).childNodes;
00139       
00140     var options = Object.extend({
00141       speed: 0.1,
00142       delay: 0.0
00143     }, arguments[2] || { });
00144     var masterDelay = options.delay;
00145 
00146     $A(elements).each( function(element, index) {
00147       new effect(element, Object.extend(options, { delay: index * options.speed + masterDelay }));
00148     });
00149   },
00150   PAIRS: {
00151     'slide':  ['SlideDown','SlideUp'],
00152     'blind':  ['BlindDown','BlindUp'],
00153     'appear': ['Appear','Fade']
00154   },
00155   toggle: function(element, effect) {
00156     element = $(element);
00157     effect = (effect || 'appear').toLowerCase();
00158     var options = Object.extend({
00159       queue: { position:'end', scope:(element.id || 'global'), limit: 1 }
00160     }, arguments[2] || { });
00161     Effect[element.visible() ? 
00162       Effect.PAIRS[effect][1] : Effect.PAIRS[effect][0]](element, options);
00163   }
00164 };
00165 
00166 Effect.DefaultOptions.transition = Effect.Transitions.sinoidal;

00170 Effect.ScopedQueue = Class.create(Enumerable, {
00171   initialize: function() {
00172     this.effects  = [];
00173     this.interval = null;    
00174   },
00175   _each: function(iterator) {
00176     this.effects._each(iterator);
00177   },
00178   add: function(effect) {
00179     var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
00180     
00181     var position = Object.isString(effect.options.queue) ? 
00182       effect.options.queue : effect.options.queue.position;
00183     
00184     switch(position) {
00185       case 'front':
00186         // move unstarted effects after this effect  
00187         this.effects.findAll(function(e){ return e.state=='idle' }).each( function(e) {
00188             e.startOn  += effect.finishOn;
00189             e.finishOn += effect.finishOn;
00190           });
00191         break;
00192       case 'with-last':
00193         timestamp = this.effects.pluck('startOn').max() || timestamp;
00194         break;
00195       case 'end':
00196         // start effect after last queued effect has finished
00197         timestamp = this.effects.pluck('finishOn').max() || timestamp;
00198         break;
00199     }
00200     
00201     effect.startOn  += timestamp;
00202     effect.finishOn += timestamp;
00203 
00204     if (!effect.options.queue.limit || (this.effects.length < effect.options.queue.limit))
00205       this.effects.push(effect);
00206     
00207     if (!this.interval)
00208       this.interval = setInterval(this.loop.bind(this), 15);
00209   },
00210   remove: function(effect) {
00211     this.effects = this.effects.reject(function(e) { return e==effect });
00212     if (this.effects.length == 0) {
00213       clearInterval(this.interval);
00214       this.interval = null;
00215     }
00216   },
00217   loop: function() {
00218     var timePos = new Date().getTime();
00219     for(var i=0, len=this.effects.length;i<len;i++) 
00220       this.effects[i] && this.effects[i].loop(timePos);
00221   }
00222 });
00223 
00224 Effect.Queues = {
00225   instances: $H(),
00226   get: function(queueName) {
00227     if (!Object.isString(queueName)) return queueName;
00228     
00229     return this.instances.get(queueName) ||
00230       this.instances.set(queueName, new Effect.ScopedQueue());
00231   }
00232 };
00233 Effect.Queue = Effect.Queues.get('global');
00234 
00235 Effect.Base = Class.create({
00236   position: null,
00237   start: function(options) {
00238     function codeForEvent(options,eventName){
00239       return (
00240         (options[eventName+'Internal'] ? 'this.options.'+eventName+'Internal(this);' : '') +
00241         (options[eventName] ? 'this.options.'+eventName+'(this);' : '')
00242       );
00243     }
00244     if (options && options.transition === false) options.transition = Effect.Transitions.linear;
00245     this.options      = Object.extend(Object.extend({ },Effect.DefaultOptions), options || { });
00246     this.currentFrame = 0;
00247     this.state        = 'idle';
00248     this.startOn      = this.options.delay*1000;
00249     this.finishOn     = this.startOn+(this.options.duration*1000);
00250     this.fromToDelta  = this.options.to-this.options.from;
00251     this.totalTime    = this.finishOn-this.startOn;
00252     this.totalFrames  = this.options.fps*this.options.duration;
00253     
00254     eval('this.render = function(pos){ '+
00255       'if (this.state=="idle"){this.state="running";'+
00256       codeForEvent(this.options,'beforeSetup')+
00257       (this.setup ? 'this.setup();':'')+ 
00258       codeForEvent(this.options,'afterSetup')+
00259       '};if (this.state=="running"){'+
00260       'pos=this.options.transition(pos)*'+this.fromToDelta+'+'+this.options.from+';'+
00261       'this.position=pos;'+
00262       codeForEvent(this.options,'beforeUpdate')+
00263       (this.update ? 'this.update(pos);':'')+
00264       codeForEvent(this.options,'afterUpdate')+
00265       '}}');
00266     
00267     this.event('beforeStart');
00268     if (!this.options.sync)
00269       Effect.Queues.get(Object.isString(this.options.queue) ? 
00270         'global' : this.options.queue.scope).add(this);
00271   },
00272   loop: function(timePos) {
00273     if (timePos >= this.startOn) {
00274       if (timePos >= this.finishOn) {
00275         this.render(1.0);
00276         this.cancel();
00277         this.event('beforeFinish');
00278         if (this.finish) this.finish(); 
00279         this.event('afterFinish');
00280         return;  
00281       }
00282       var pos   = (timePos - this.startOn) / this.totalTime,
00283           frame = (pos * this.totalFrames).round();
00284       if (frame > this.currentFrame) {
00285         this.render(pos);
00286         this.currentFrame = frame;
00287       }
00288     }
00289   },
00290   cancel: function() {
00291     if (!this.options.sync)
00292       Effect.Queues.get(Object.isString(this.options.queue) ? 
00293         'global' : this.options.queue.scope).remove(this);
00294     this.state = 'finished';
00295   },
00296   event: function(eventName) {
00297     if (this.options[eventName + 'Internal']) this.options[eventName + 'Internal'](this);
00298     if (this.options[eventName]) this.options[eventName](this);
00299   },
00300   inspect: function() {
00301     var data = $H();
00302     for(property in this)
00303       if (!Object.isFunction(this[property])) data.set(property, this[property]);
00304     return '#<Effect:' + data.inspect() + ',options:' + $H(this.options).inspect() + '>';
00305   }
00306 });
00307 
00308 Effect.Parallel = Class.create(Effect.Base, {
00309   initialize: function(effects) {
00310     this.effects = effects || [];
00311     this.start(arguments[1]);
00312   },
00313   update: function(position) {
00314     this.effects.invoke('render', position);
00315   },
00316   finish: function(position) {
00317     this.effects.each( function(effect) {
00318       effect.render(1.0);
00319       effect.cancel();
00320       effect.event('beforeFinish');
00321       if (effect.finish) effect.finish(position);
00322       effect.event('afterFinish');
00323     });
00324   }
00325 });
00326 
00327 Effect.Tween = Class.create(Effect.Base, {
00328   initialize: function(object, from, to) {
00329     object = Object.isString(object) ? $(object) : object;
00330     var args = $A(arguments), method = args.last(), 
00331       options = args.length == 5 ? args[3] : null;
00332     this.method = Object.isFunction(method) ? method.bind(object) :
00333       Object.isFunction(object[method]) ? object[method].bind(object) : 
00334       function(value) { object[method] = value };
00335     this.start(Object.extend({ from: from, to: to }, options || { }));
00336   },
00337   update: function(position) {
00338     this.method(position);
00339   }
00340 });
00341 
00342 Effect.Event = Class.create(Effect.Base, {
00343   initialize: function() {
00344     this.start(Object.extend({ duration: 0 }, arguments[0] || { }));
00345   },
00346   update: Prototype.emptyFunction
00347 });

00349 Effect.Opacity = Class.create(Effect.Base, {
00350   initialize: function(element) {
00351     this.element = $(element);
00352     if (!this.element) throw(Effect._elementDoesNotExistError);
00353     // make this work on IE on elements without 'layout'
00354     if (Prototype.Browser.IE && (!this.element.currentStyle.hasLayout))
00355       this.element.setStyle({zoom: 1});
00356     var options = Object.extend({
00357       from: this.element.getOpacity() || 0.0,
00358       to:   1.0
00359     }, arguments[1] || { });
00360     this.start(options);
00361   },
00362   update: function(position) {
00363     this.element.setOpacity(position);
00364   }
00365 });

00367 Effect.Move = Class.create(Effect.Base, {
00368   initialize: function(element) {
00369     this.element = $(element);
00370     if (!this.element) throw(Effect._elementDoesNotExistError);
00371     var options = Object.extend({
00372       x:    0,
00373       y:    0,
00374       mode: 'relative'
00375     }, arguments[1] || { });
00376     this.start(options);
00377   },
00378   setup: function() {
00379     this.element.makePositioned();
00380     this.originalLeft = parseFloat(this.element.getStyle('left') || '0');
00381     this.originalTop  = parseFloat(this.element.getStyle('top')  || '0');
00382     if (this.options.mode == 'absolute') {
00383       this.options.x = this.options.x - this.originalLeft;
00384       this.options.y = this.options.y - this.originalTop;
00385     }
00386   },
00387   update: function(position) {
00388     this.element.setStyle({
00389       left: (this.options.x  * position + this.originalLeft).round() + 'px',
00390       top:  (this.options.y  * position + this.originalTop).round()  + 'px'
00391     });
00392   }
00393 });

00395 // for backwards compatibility
00396 Effect.MoveBy = function(element, toTop, toLeft) {
00397   return new Effect.Move(element, 
00398     Object.extend({ x: toLeft, y: toTop }, arguments[3] || { }));
00399 };

00401 Effect.Scale = Class.create(Effect.Base, {
00402   initialize: function(element, percent) {
00403     this.element = $(element);
00404     if (!this.element) throw(Effect._elementDoesNotExistError);
00405     var options = Object.extend({
00406       scaleX: true,
00407       scaleY: true,
00408       scaleContent: true,
00409       scaleFromCenter: false,
00410       scaleMode: 'box',        // 'box' or 'contents' or { } with provided values
00411       scaleFrom: 100.0,
00412       scaleTo:   percent
00413     }, arguments[2] || { });
00414     this.start(options);
00415   },
00416   setup: function() {
00417     this.restoreAfterFinish = this.options.restoreAfterFinish || false;
00418     this.elementPositioning = this.element.getStyle('position');
00419     
00420     this.originalStyle = { };
00421     ['top','left','width','height','fontSize'].each( function(k) {
00422       this.originalStyle[k] = this.element.style[k];
00423     }.bind(this));
00424       
00425     this.originalTop  = this.element.offsetTop;
00426     this.originalLeft = this.element.offsetLeft;
00427     
00428     var fontSize = this.element.getStyle('font-size') || '100%';
00429     ['em','px','%','pt'].each( function(fontSizeType) {
00430       if (fontSize.indexOf(fontSizeType)>0) {
00431         this.fontSize     = parseFloat(fontSize);
00432         this.fontSizeType = fontSizeType;
00433       }
00434     }.bind(this));
00435     
00436     this.factor = (this.options.scaleTo - this.options.scaleFrom)/100;
00437     
00438     this.dims = null;
00439     if (this.options.scaleMode=='box')
00440       this.dims = [this.element.offsetHeight, this.element.offsetWidth];
00441     if (/^content/.test(this.options.scaleMode))
00442       this.dims = [this.element.scrollHeight, this.element.scrollWidth];
00443     if (!this.dims)
00444       this.dims = [this.options.scaleMode.originalHeight,
00445                    this.options.scaleMode.originalWidth];
00446   },
00447   update: function(position) {
00448     var currentScale = (this.options.scaleFrom/100.0) + (this.factor * position);
00449     if (this.options.scaleContent && this.fontSize)
00450       this.element.setStyle({fontSize: this.fontSize * currentScale + this.fontSizeType });
00451     this.setDimensions(this.dims[0] * currentScale, this.dims[1] * currentScale);
00452   },
00453   finish: function(position) {
00454     if (this.restoreAfterFinish) this.element.setStyle(this.originalStyle);
00455   },
00456   setDimensions: function(height, width) {
00457     var d = { };
00458     if (this.options.scaleX) d.width = width.round() + 'px';
00459     if (this.options.scaleY) d.height = height.round() + 'px';
00460     if (this.options.scaleFromCenter) {
00461       var topd  = (height - this.dims[0])/2;
00462       var leftd = (width  - this.dims[1])/2;
00463       if (this.elementPositioning == 'absolute') {
00464         if (this.options.scaleY) d.top = this.originalTop-topd + 'px';
00465         if (this.options.scaleX) d.left = this.originalLeft-leftd + 'px';
00466       } else {
00467         if (this.options.scaleY) d.top = -topd + 'px';
00468         if (this.options.scaleX) d.left = -leftd + 'px';
00469       }
00470     }
00471     this.element.setStyle(d);
00472   }
00473 });

00475 Effect.Highlight = Class.create(Effect.Base, {
00476   initialize: function(element) {
00477     this.element = $(element);
00478     if (!this.element) throw(Effect._elementDoesNotExistError);
00479     var options = Object.extend({ startcolor: '#ffff99' }, arguments[1] || { });
00480     this.start(options);
00481   },
00482   setup: function() {
00483     // Prevent executing on elements not in the layout flow
00484     if (this.element.getStyle('display')=='none') { this.cancel(); return; }
00485     // Disable background image during the effect
00486     this.oldStyle = { };
00487     if (!this.options.keepBackgroundImage) {
00488       this.oldStyle.backgroundImage = this.element.getStyle('background-image');
00489       this.element.setStyle({backgroundImage: 'none'});
00490     }
00491     if (!this.options.endcolor)
00492       this.options.endcolor = this.element.getStyle('background-color').parseColor('#ffffff');
00493     if (!this.options.restorecolor)
00494       this.options.restorecolor = this.element.getStyle('background-color');
00495     // init color calculations
00496     this._base  = $R(0,2).map(function(i){ return parseInt(this.options.startcolor.slice(i*2+1,i*2+3),16) }.bind(this));
00497     this._delta = $R(0,2).map(function(i){ return parseInt(this.options.endcolor.slice(i*2+1,i*2+3),16)-this._base[i] }.bind(this));
00498   },
00499   update: function(position) {
00500     this.element.setStyle({backgroundColor: $R(0,2).inject('#',function(m,v,i){
00501       return m+((this._base[i]+(this._delta[i]*position)).round().toColorPart()); }.bind(this)) });
00502   },
00503   finish: function() {
00504     this.element.setStyle(Object.extend(this.oldStyle, {
00505       backgroundColor: this.options.restorecolor
00506     }));
00507   }
00508 });

00510 Effect.ScrollTo = function(element) {
00511   var options = arguments[1] || { },
00512     scrollOffsets = document.viewport.getScrollOffsets(),
00513     elementOffsets = $(element).cumulativeOffset(),
00514     max = (window.height || document.body.scrollHeight) - document.viewport.getHeight();  
00515 
00516   if (options.offset) elementOffsets[1] += options.offset;
00517 
00518   return new Effect.Tween(null,
00519     scrollOffsets.top,
00520     elementOffsets[1] > max ? max : elementOffsets[1],
00521     options,
00522     function(p){ scrollTo(scrollOffsets.left, p.round()) }
00523   );
00524 };

00528 Effect.Fade = function(element) {
00529   element = $(element);
00530   var oldOpacity = element.getInlineOpacity();
00531   var options = Object.extend({
00532     from: element.getOpacity() || 1.0,
00533     to:   0.0,
00534     afterFinishInternal: function(effect) { 
00535       if (effect.options.to!=0) return;
00536       effect.element.hide().setStyle({opacity: oldOpacity}); 
00537     }
00538   }, arguments[1] || { });
00539   return new Effect.Opacity(element,options);
00540 };
00541 
00542 Effect.Appear = function(element) {
00543   element = $(element);
00544   var options = Object.extend({
00545   from: (element.getStyle('display') == 'none' ? 0.0 : element.getOpacity() || 0.0),
00546   to:   1.0,
00547   // force Safari to render floated elements properly
00548   afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00549     effect.element.forceRerendering();
00550   },
00551   beforeSetup: function(effect) {
00552     effect.element.setOpacity(effect.options.from).show(); 
00553   }}, arguments[1] || { });
00554   return new Effect.Opacity(element,options);
00555 };
00556 
00557 Effect.Puff = function(element) {
00558   element = $(element);
00559   var oldStyle = { 
00560     opacity: element.getInlineOpacity(), 
00561     position: element.getStyle('position'),
00562     top:  element.style.top,
00563     left: element.style.left,
00564     width: element.style.width,
00565     height: element.style.height
00566   };
00567   return new Effect.Parallel(
00568    [ new Effect.Scale(element, 200, 
00569       { sync: true, scaleFromCenter: true, scaleContent: true, restoreAfterFinish: true }), 
00570      new Effect.Opacity(element, { sync: true, to: 0.0 } ) ], 
00571      Object.extend({ duration: 1.0, 
00572       beforeSetupInternal: function(effect) {
00573         Position.absolutize(effect.effects[0].element)
00574       },
00575       afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00576          effect.effects[0].element.hide().setStyle(oldStyle); }
00577      }, arguments[1] || { })
00578    );
00579 };

00581 Effect.BlindUp = function(element) {
00582   element = $(element);
00583   element.makeClipping();
00584   return new Effect.Scale(element, 0,
00585     Object.extend({ scaleContent: false, 
00586       scaleX: false, 
00587       restoreAfterFinish: true,
00588       afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00589         effect.element.hide().undoClipping();
00590       } 
00591     }, arguments[1] || { })
00592   );
00593 };

00597   var elementDimensions = element.getDimensions();

00599     scaleContent: false, 
00600     scaleX: false,
00601     scaleFrom: 0,
00602     scaleMode: {originalHeight: elementDimensions.height, originalWidth: elementDimensions.width},
00603     restoreAfterFinish: true,
00604     afterSetup: function(effect) {
00605       effect.element.makeClipping().setStyle({height: '0px'}).show(); 
00606     },  
00607     afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00608       effect.element.undoClipping();
00609     }
00610   }, arguments[1] || { }));

00615   var oldOpacity = element.getInlineOpacity();
00616   return new Effect.Appear(element, Object.extend({
00617     duration: 0.4,
00618     from: 0,
00619     transition: Effect.Transitions.flicker,
00620     afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00621       new Effect.Scale(effect.element, 1, { 
00622         duration: 0.3, scaleFromCenter: true,
00623         scaleX: false, scaleContent: false, restoreAfterFinish: true,
00624         beforeSetup: function(effect) { 
00625           effect.element.makePositioned().makeClipping();
00626         },
00627         afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00628           effect.element.hide().undoClipping().undoPositioned().setStyle({opacity: oldOpacity});
00629         }
00630       })
00631     }

00635 Effect.DropOut = function(element) {
00636   element = $(element);
00637   var oldStyle = {
00638     top: element.getStyle('top'),
00639     left: element.getStyle('left'),
00640     opacity: element.getInlineOpacity() };
00641   return new Effect.Parallel(
00642     [ new Effect.Move(element, {x: 0, y: 100, sync: true }), 
00643       new Effect.Opacity(element, { sync: true, to: 0.0 }) ],
00644     Object.extend(
00645       { duration: 0.5,
00646         beforeSetup: function(effect) {
00647           effect.effects[0].element.makePositioned(); 
00648         },
00649         afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00650           effect.effects[0].element.hide().undoPositioned().setStyle(oldStyle);
00651         } 
00652       }, arguments[1] || { }));

00655 Effect.Shake = function(element) {
00656   element = $(element);
00657   var options = Object.extend({
00658     distance: 20,
00659     duration: 0.5
00660   }, arguments[1] || {});
00661   var distance = parseFloat(options.distance);
00662   var split = parseFloat(options.duration) / 10.0;
00663   var oldStyle = {
00664     top: element.getStyle('top'),
00665     left: element.getStyle('left') };
00666     return new Effect.Move(element,
00667       { x:  distance, y: 0, duration: split, afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00668     new Effect.Move(effect.element,
00669       { x: -distance*2, y: 0, duration: split*2,  afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00670     new Effect.Move(effect.element,
00671       { x:  distance*2, y: 0, duration: split*2,  afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00672     new Effect.Move(effect.element,
00673       { x: -distance*2, y: 0, duration: split*2,  afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00674     new Effect.Move(effect.element,
00675       { x:  distance*2, y: 0, duration: split*2,  afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00676     new Effect.Move(effect.element,
00677       { x: -distance, y: 0, duration: split, afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00678         effect.element.undoPositioned().setStyle(oldStyle);
00679   }}) }}) }}) }}) }}) }});
00680 };

00682 Effect.SlideDown = function(element) {
00683   element = $(element).cleanWhitespace();
00684   // SlideDown need to have the content of the element wrapped in a container element with fixed height!
00685   var oldInnerBottom = element.down().getStyle('bottom');
00686   var elementDimensions = element.getDimensions();
00687   return new Effect.Scale(element, 100, Object.extend({ 
00688     scaleContent: false, 
00689     scaleX: false, 
00690     scaleFrom: window.opera ? 0 : 1,
00691     scaleMode: {originalHeight: elementDimensions.height, originalWidth: elementDimensions.width},
00692     restoreAfterFinish: true,
00693     afterSetup: function(effect) {
00694       effect.element.makePositioned();
00695       effect.element.down().makePositioned();
00696       if (window.opera) effect.element.setStyle({top: ''});
00697       effect.element.makeClipping().setStyle({height: '0px'}).show(); 
00698     },
00699     afterUpdateInternal: function(effect) {
00700       effect.element.down().setStyle({bottom:
00701         (effect.dims[0] - effect.element.clientHeight) + 'px' }); 
00702     },
00703     afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00704       effect.element.undoClipping().undoPositioned();
00705       effect.element.down().undoPositioned().setStyle({bottom: oldInnerBottom}); }
00706     }, arguments[1] || { })
00707   );
00708 };
00709 
00710 Effect.SlideUp = function(element) {
00711   element = $(element).cleanWhitespace();
00712   var oldInnerBottom = element.down().getStyle('bottom');
00713   var elementDimensions = element.getDimensions();
00714   return new Effect.Scale(element, window.opera ? 0 : 1,
00715    Object.extend({ scaleContent: false, 
00716     scaleX: false, 
00717     scaleMode: 'box',
00718     scaleFrom: 100,
00719     scaleMode: {originalHeight: elementDimensions.height, originalWidth: elementDimensions.width},
00720     restoreAfterFinish: true,
00721     afterSetup: function(effect) {
00722       effect.element.makePositioned();
00723       effect.element.down().makePositioned();
00724       if (window.opera) effect.element.setStyle({top: ''});
00725       effect.element.makeClipping().show();
00726     },  
00727     afterUpdateInternal: function(effect) {
00728       effect.element.down().setStyle({bottom:
00729         (effect.dims[0] - effect.element.clientHeight) + 'px' });
00730     },
00731     afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00732       effect.element.hide().undoClipping().undoPositioned();
00733       effect.element.down().undoPositioned().setStyle({bottom: oldInnerBottom});
00734     }
00735    }, arguments[1] || { })
00736   );
00737 };

00740 Effect.Squish = function(element) {
00741   return new Effect.Scale(element, window.opera ? 1 : 0, { 
00742     restoreAfterFinish: true,
00743     beforeSetup: function(effect) {
00744       effect.element.makeClipping(); 
00745     },  
00746     afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00747       effect.element.hide().undoClipping(); 
00748     }
00749   });
00750 };

00752 Effect.Grow = function(element) {
00753   element = $(element);
00754   var options = Object.extend({
00755     direction: 'center',
00756     moveTransition: Effect.Transitions.sinoidal,
00757     scaleTransition: Effect.Transitions.sinoidal,
00758     opacityTransition: Effect.Transitions.full
00759   }, arguments[1] || { });
00760   var oldStyle = {
00761     top: element.style.top,
00762     left: element.style.left,
00763     height: element.style.height,
00764     width: element.style.width,
00765     opacity: element.getInlineOpacity() };
00766 
00767   var dims = element.getDimensions();    
00768   var initialMoveX, initialMoveY;
00769   var moveX, moveY;
00770   
00771   switch (options.direction) {
00772     case 'top-left':
00773       initialMoveX = initialMoveY = moveX = moveY = 0; 
00774       break;
00775     case 'top-right':
00776       initialMoveX = dims.width;
00777       initialMoveY = moveY = 0;
00778       moveX = -dims.width;
00779       break;
00780     case 'bottom-left':
00781       initialMoveX = moveX = 0;
00782       initialMoveY = dims.height;
00783       moveY = -dims.height;
00784       break;
00785     case 'bottom-right':
00786       initialMoveX = dims.width;
00787       initialMoveY = dims.height;
00788       moveX = -dims.width;
00789       moveY = -dims.height;
00790       break;
00791     case 'center':
00792       initialMoveX = dims.width / 2;
00793       initialMoveY = dims.height / 2;
00794       moveX = -dims.width / 2;
00795       moveY = -dims.height / 2;
00796       break;
00797   }
00798   
00799   return new Effect.Move(element, {
00800     x: initialMoveX,
00801     y: initialMoveY,
00802     duration: 0.01, 
00803     beforeSetup: function(effect) {
00804       effect.element.hide().makeClipping().makePositioned();
00805     },
00806     afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00807       new Effect.Parallel(
00808         [ new Effect.Opacity(effect.element, { sync: true, to: 1.0, from: 0.0, transition: options.opacityTransition }),
00809           new Effect.Move(effect.element, { x: moveX, y: moveY, sync: true, transition: options.moveTransition }),
00810           new Effect.Scale(effect.element, 100, {
00811             scaleMode: { originalHeight: dims.height, originalWidth: dims.width }, 
00812             sync: true, scaleFrom: window.opera ? 1 : 0, transition: options.scaleTransition, restoreAfterFinish: true})
00813         ], Object.extend({
00814              beforeSetup: function(effect) {
00815                effect.effects[0].element.setStyle({height: '0px'}).show(); 
00816              },
00817              afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00818                effect.effects[0].element.undoClipping().undoPositioned().setStyle(oldStyle); 
00819              }
00820            }, options)
00821       )
00822     }
00823   });
00824 };
00825 
00826 Effect.Shrink = function(element) {
00827   element = $(element);
00828   var options = Object.extend({
00829     direction: 'center',
00830     moveTransition: Effect.Transitions.sinoidal,
00831     scaleTransition: Effect.Transitions.sinoidal,
00832     opacityTransition: Effect.Transitions.none
00833   }, arguments[1] || { });
00834   var oldStyle = {
00835     top: element.style.top,
00836     left: element.style.left,
00837     height: element.style.height,
00838     width: element.style.width,
00839     opacity: element.getInlineOpacity() };
00840 
00841   var dims = element.getDimensions();
00842   var moveX, moveY;
00843   
00844   switch (options.direction) {
00845     case 'top-left':
00846       moveX = moveY = 0;
00847       break;
00848     case 'top-right':
00849       moveX = dims.width;
00850       moveY = 0;
00851       break;
00852     case 'bottom-left':
00853       moveX = 0;
00854       moveY = dims.height;
00855       break;
00856     case 'bottom-right':
00857       moveX = dims.width;
00858       moveY = dims.height;
00859       break;
00860     case 'center':  
00861       moveX = dims.width / 2;
00862       moveY = dims.height / 2;
00863       break;
00864   }
00865   
00866   return new Effect.Parallel(
00867     [ new Effect.Opacity(element, { sync: true, to: 0.0, from: 1.0, transition: options.opacityTransition }),
00868       new Effect.Scale(element, window.opera ? 1 : 0, { sync: true, transition: options.scaleTransition, restoreAfterFinish: true}),
00869       new Effect.Move(element, { x: moveX, y: moveY, sync: true, transition: options.moveTransition })
00870     ], Object.extend({            
00871          beforeStartInternal: function(effect) {
00872            effect.effects[0].element.makePositioned().makeClipping(); 
00873          },
00874          afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00875            effect.effects[0].element.hide().undoClipping().undoPositioned().setStyle(oldStyle); }
00876        }, options)
00877   );
00878 };

00880 Effect.Pulsate = function(element) {
00881   element = $(element);
00882   var options    = arguments[1] || { };
00883   var oldOpacity = element.getInlineOpacity();
00884   var transition = options.transition || Effect.Transitions.sinoidal;
00885   var reverser   = function(pos){ return transition(1-Effect.Transitions.pulse(pos, options.pulses)) };
00886   reverser.bind(transition);
00887   return new Effect.Opacity(element, 
00888     Object.extend(Object.extend({  duration: 2.0, from: 0,
00889       afterFinishInternal: function(effect) { effect.element.setStyle({opacity: oldOpacity}); }
00890     }, options), {transition: reverser}));
00891 };

00893 Effect.Fold = function(element) {
00894   element = $(element);
00895   var oldStyle = {
00896     top: element.style.top,
00897     left: element.style.left,
00898     width: element.style.width,
00899     height: element.style.height };
00900   element.makeClipping();
00901   return new Effect.Scale(element, 5, Object.extend({   
00902     scaleContent: false,
00903     scaleX: false,
00904     afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00905     new Effect.Scale(element, 1, { 
00906       scaleContent: false, 
00907       scaleY: false,
00908       afterFinishInternal: function(effect) {
00909         effect.element.hide().undoClipping().setStyle(oldStyle);
00910       } });
00911   }}, arguments[1] || { }));
00912 };
00913 
00914 Effect.Morph = Class.create(Effect.Base, {
00915   initialize: function(element) {
00916     this.element = $(element);
00917     if (!this.element) throw(Effect._elementDoesNotExistError);
00918     var options = Object.extend({
00919       style: { }
00920     }, arguments[1] || { });
00921     
00922     if (!Object.isString(options.style)) this.style = $H(options.style);
00923     else {
00924       if (options.style.include(':'))
00925         this.style = options.style.parseStyle();
00926       else {
00927         this.element.addClassName(options.style);
00928         this.style = $H(this.element.getStyles());
00929         this.element.removeClassName(options.style);
00930         var css = this.element.getStyles();
00931         this.style = this.style.reject(function(style) {
00932           return style.value == css[style.key];
00933         });
00934         options.afterFinishInternal = function(effect) {
00935           effect.element.addClassName(effect.options.style);
00936           effect.transforms.each(function(transform) {
00937             effect.element.style[transform.style] = '';
00938           });
00939         }
00940       }
00941     }
00942     this.start(options);
00943   },
00944   
00945   setup: function(){
00946     function parseColor(color){
00947       if (!color || ['rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)','transparent'].include(color)) color = '#ffffff';
00948       color = color.parseColor();
00949       return $R(0,2).map(function(i){
00950         return parseInt( color.slice(i*2+1,i*2+3), 16 ) 
00951       });
00952     }
00953     this.transforms = this.style.map(function(pair){
00954       var property = pair[0], value = pair[1], unit = null;
00955 
00956       if (value.parseColor('#zzzzzz') != '#zzzzzz') {
00957         value = value.parseColor();
00958         unit  = 'color';
00959       } else if (property == 'opacity') {
00960         value = parseFloat(value);
00961         if (Prototype.Browser.IE && (!this.element.currentStyle.hasLayout))
00962           this.element.setStyle({zoom: 1});
00963       } else if (Element.CSS_LENGTH.test(value)) {
00964           var components = value.match(/^([\+\-]?[0-9\.]+)(.*)$/);
00965           value = parseFloat(components[1]);
00966           unit = (components.length == 3) ? components[2] : null;
00967       }
00968 
00969       var originalValue = this.element.getStyle(property);
00970       return { 
00971         style: property.camelize(), 
00972         originalValue: unit=='color' ? parseColor(originalValue) : parseFloat(originalValue || 0), 
00973         targetValue: unit=='color' ? parseColor(value) : value,
00974         unit: unit
00975       };
00976     }.bind(this)).reject(function(transform){
00977       return (
00978         (transform.originalValue == transform.targetValue) ||
00979         (
00980           transform.unit != 'color' &&
00981           (isNaN(transform.originalValue) || isNaN(transform.targetValue))
00982         )
00983       )
00984     });
00985   },
00986   update: function(position) {
00987     var style = { }, transform, i = this.transforms.length;
00988     while(i--)
00989       style[(transform = this.transforms[i]).style] = 
00990         transform.unit=='color' ? '#'+
00991           (Math.round(transform.originalValue[0]+
00992             (transform.targetValue[0]-transform.originalValue[0])*position)).toColorPart() +
00993           (Math.round(transform.originalValue[1]+
00994             (transform.targetValue[1]-transform.originalValue[1])*position)).toColorPart() +
00995           (Math.round(transform.originalValue[2]+
00996             (transform.targetValue[2]-transform.originalValue[2])*position)).toColorPart() :
00997         (transform.originalValue +
00998           (transform.targetValue - transform.originalValue) * position).toFixed(3) + 
00999             (transform.unit === null ? '' : transform.unit);
01000     this.element.setStyle(style, true);
01001   }
01002 });
01003 
01004 Effect.Transform = Class.create({
01005   initialize: function(tracks){
01006     this.tracks  = [];
01007     this.options = arguments[1] || { };
01008     this.addTracks(tracks);
01009   },
01010   addTracks: function(tracks){
01011     tracks.each(function(track){
01012       track = $H(track);
01013       var data = track.values().first();
01014       this.tracks.push($H({
01015         ids:     track.keys().first(),
01016         effect:  Effect.Morph,
01017         options: { style: data }
01018       }));
01019     }.bind(this));
01020     return this;
01021   },
01022   play: function(){
01023     return new Effect.Parallel(
01024       this.tracks.map(function(track){
01025         var ids = track.get('ids'), effect = track.get('effect'), options = track.get('options');
01026         var elements = [$(ids) || $$(ids)].flatten();
01027         return elements.map(function(e){ return new effect(e, Object.extend({ sync:true }, options)) });
01028       }).flatten(),
01029       this.options
01030     );
01031   }
01032 });

01034 Element.CSS_PROPERTIES = $w(
01035   'backgroundColor backgroundPosition borderBottomColor borderBottomStyle ' + 
01036   'borderBottomWidth borderLeftColor borderLeftStyle borderLeftWidth ' +
01037   'borderRightColor borderRightStyle borderRightWidth borderSpacing ' +
01038   'borderTopColor borderTopStyle borderTopWidth bottom clip color ' +
01039   'fontSize fontWeight height left letterSpacing lineHeight ' +
01040   'marginBottom marginLeft marginRight marginTop markerOffset maxHeight '+
01041   'maxWidth minHeight minWidth opacity outlineColor outlineOffset ' +
01042   'outlineWidth paddingBottom paddingLeft paddingRight paddingTop ' +
01043   'right textIndent top width wordSpacing zIndex');
01044   
01045 Element.CSS_LENGTH = /^(([\+\-]?[0-9\.]+)(em|ex|px|in|cm|mm|pt|pc|\%))|0$/;
01046 
01047 String.__parseStyleElement = document.createElement('div');
01048 String.prototype.parseStyle = function(){
01049   var style, styleRules = $H();
01050   if (Prototype.Browser.WebKit)
01051     style = new Element('div',{style:this}).style;
01052   else {
01053     String.__parseStyleElement.innerHTML = '<div style="' + this + '"></div>';
01054     style = String.__parseStyleElement.childNodes[0].style;
01055   }
01056   
01057   Element.CSS_PROPERTIES.each(function(property){
01058     if (style[property]) styleRules.set(property, style[property]); 
01059   });
01060   
01061   if (Prototype.Browser.IE && this.include('opacity'))
01062     styleRules.set('opacity', this.match(/opacity:\s*((?:0|1)?(?:\.\d*)?)/)[1]);
01063 
01064   return styleRules;
01065 };
01066 
01067 if (document.defaultView && document.defaultView.getComputedStyle) {
01068   Element.getStyles = function(element) {
01069     var css = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle($(element), null);
01070     return Element.CSS_PROPERTIES.inject({ }, function(styles, property) {
01071       styles[property] = css[property];
01072       return styles;
01073     });
01074   };
01075 } else {
01076   Element.getStyles = function(element) {
01077     element = $(element);
01078     var css = element.currentStyle, styles;
01079     styles = Element.CSS_PROPERTIES.inject({ }, function(results, property) {
01080       results[property] = css[property];
01081       return results;
01082     });
01083     if (!styles.opacity) styles.opacity = element.getOpacity();
01084     return styles;
01085   };
01086 };

01088 Effect.Methods = {
01089   morph: function(element, style) {
01090     element = $(element);
01091     new Effect.Morph(element, Object.extend({ style: style }, arguments[2] || { }));
01092     return element;
01093   },
01094   visualEffect: function(element, effect, options) {
01095     element = $(element)
01096     var s = effect.dasherize().camelize(), klass = s.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + s.substring(1);
01097     new Effect[klass](element, options);
01098     return element;
01099   },
01100   highlight: function(element, options) {
01101     element = $(element);
01102     new Effect.Highlight(element, options);
01103     return element;
01104   }
01105 };
01106 
01107 $w('fade appear grow shrink fold blindUp blindDown slideUp slideDown '+
01108   'pulsate shake puff squish switchOff dropOut').each(
01109   function(effect) { 
01110     Effect.Methods[effect] = function(element, options){
01111       element = $(element);
01112       Effect[effect.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + effect.substring(1)](element, options);
01113       return element;
01114     }
01115   }
01116 );

01118 $w('getInlineOpacity forceRerendering setContentZoom collectTextNodes collectTextNodesIgnoreClass getStyles').each( 
01119   function(f) { Effect.Methods[f] = Element[f]; }
01120 );

01122 Element.addMethods(Effect.Methods);
